Date Weekly theme & learning outcomes Learning activities Assessments (%) Resources CLRs
Week 01 Intro & reviews
An introduction to the term, including the term-long project, and a simple, quick review.		 • Slides: Web Dev 4 intro
 • Exercise: Acronym Annihilator (2.1%)
• Exercise: Responsive banner (2.1%)
• Project: Dog rescue redesign UX (15.0%)
 Learn the Web, Web Dev 4: Week 01 1, 5
Week 02 Transitions & animations
Look at the effects that can be created with CSS using transforms, transitions and animations.		 • Slides: CSS effects
 • Exercise: News reader effects (2.1%)
• Exercise: Interactive polaroids (2.1%)
• Exercise: Animated clock (2.1%)
 Learn the Web, Web Dev 4: Week 02 1, 2
Week 03 Advanced SVG
An in-depth look at the code behind SVG files, writing them by hand, and adding effects to them.		 • Slides: Advanced SVG
 • Exercise: SVG smiley face (2.1%)
• Exercise: Interactive SVG (2.1%)
 Learn the Web, Web Dev 4: Week 03 1, 2
Week 04 SVG icons
Look at how to use SVG symbols to create SVG sprite sheets for better performance and reusable systems.		 • Slides: SVG icons
 • Exercise: Using SVG icons (2.1%)
• Exercise: SVG icons sets (2.1%)
 Learn the Web, Web Dev 4: Week 04 1, 2, 3, 4
Week 05 Pattern libraries
An introduction to pattern libraries, setting up a basic library, and populating it with typography-related styles.		 • Slides: Pattern libraries
 • Exercise: Using CSS variables (2.1%)
• Exercise: Pattern library set-up (2.1%)
• Exercise: Typography & colours (2.1%)
 Learn the Web, Web Dev 4: Week 05 1, 2, 3, 4, 5
Week 06 Buttons!
No website is a website without buttons. Buttons, buttons. Buttons! And maybe links too.		 • Slides: Markdown & YAML
 • Exercise: Pattern library README (2.1%)
• Exercise: Making a new pattern (2.1%)
• Exercise: Buttons! (2.1%)
 Learn the Web, Web Dev 4: Week 06 1, 2, 3, 4
Week 07 Icons & images
Make the icons sprite sheet and create common patterns for images: captions, cards, containers and more.		 • Exercise: Multi-file patterns (2.1%)
• Exercise: Icons (2.1%)
• Exercise: Images & cards (2.1%)
 Learn the Web, Web Dev 4: Week 07 1, 2, 3, 4
Week 08 Forms
Complex websites are full of forms, and there are lots of elements that need to be designed & patterned.		 • Slides: Form error messages
• Group activity: Form design best practices
 • Exercise: Designing form errors (2.1%)
• Exercise: Forms & fields (2.1%)
 Learn the Web, Web Dev 4: Week 08 1, 2, 3, 4
Week 09 Navigations & sections
Big websites usually have multiple navigation styles, each navigation is a unique design. And different sections that act as secondary navigation driving people to specific locations.		 • Exercise: URL Explorer (2.1%)
• Exercise: Browser testing (2.1%)
• Exercise: Navigations & sections (2.1%)
 Learn the Web, Web Dev 4: Week 09 1, 2, 3, 4
Week 10 Headers & footers
Create the header and footer patterns separately so they can be tested and reused.		 • Exercise: SVG Synthesizer (2.1%)
• Exercise: Headers & footers (2.1%)
 Learn the Web, Web Dev 4: Week 10 1, 2, 3, 4, 5
Week 11 Carousels & leftovers
Carousels and tab systems are popular on lots of websites. Learn to implement a functional and reusable carousel without Javascript.		 • Activity: The leftovers
 • Exercise: Specificity Spy (2.1%)
• Exercise: Javascript-less carousel (2.1%)
 Learn the Web, Web Dev 4: Week 11 1, 2, 3, 4, 5
Week 12 Home page template
Use all the finished patterns to create the home page template.		 • Exercise: Browser testing (2.1%)
• Exercise: Homepage template (2.1%)
 Learn the Web, Web Dev 4: Week 12 1, 2, 3, 4, 5
Week 13 Inside page template
Use all the finalized patterns to generate an example inside page template.		 • Exercise: Markdown Manipulator (2.1%)
• Exercise: Available dogs page template (2.1%)
 Learn the Web, Web Dev 4: Week 13 1, 2, 3, 4, 5
Week 14 Form page template
Create the application form page using all the form input and common page patterns.		 • Group activity: Course feedback
 • Exercise: YAML Yodeller (2.1%)
• Exercise: Form page template (2.1%)
 Learn the Web, Web Dev 4: Week 14 1, 2, 3, 4, 5
Week 15 Final browser testing
Browser test all the page template and finalize the pattern library.		 • Activity: Request for grade
 • Exercise: Browser testing (2.1%)
• Project: Finalized pattern library (15.0%)
 Learn the Web, Web Dev 4: Week 15 1, 2, 3, 4, 5
